snoopy.blindnote: SNORD51 is predicted to guide the 2'O-ribose methylation of 28S rRNA A1511. methylation of A1511 is also guided by SNORD32. (20100907末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から1nt短くし、3'側から4nt短くした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088.
